name: temp_kill_01
text: You came too close to the secrets.

text: The temple cannot protect itself. That's why I'm here.

name: temp_rival_01
text: Riki, it's no secret that you're a poor assassin.
text_simple: riki its no secret that youre a poor assassin

name: temp_rival_02
text: Your failure was no mystery to me, Bounty Hunter.
text_simple: your failure was no mystery to me bounty hunter

name: temp_rival_03
text: Phantom, I was not a fan.
text_simple: phantom i was not a fan

name: temp_rival_04
text: Warlock, your soul is an open book with moldy pages.
text_simple: warlock your soul is an open book with moldy pages

name: temp_rival_05
text: Warlock, you were so easy to read.
text_simple: warlock you were so easy to read

name: temp_rival_06
text: I believe, Invoker, you must have come too close to the mysteries.
text_simple: i believe invoker you must have come too close to the mysteries

name: temp_rival_07
text: You almost had our secrets, so we could not let you live.
text_simple: you almost had our secrets so we could not let you live

name: temp_rival_08
text: Omniknight, your continual braying had to be silenced.
text_simple: omniknight your continual braying had to be silenced

name: temp_rival_09
text: Next time, keep your Omniscience to yourself.
text_simple: next time keep your omniscience to yourself

name: temp_rival_10
text: I'm not that sort of templar, knight.
text_simple: im not that sort of templar knight

name: temp_rival_11
text: The only mystery is how you lasted so long.
text_simple: the only mystery is how you lasted so long
pretty_criteria: Killing a hero|A grandmaster hero chat wheel was used

name: temp_rival_12
text: Oh, Spectre, we could have shared such secrets.
text_simple: oh spectre we could have shared such secrets

name: temp_rival_13
text: I thought you spoke of mysteries but I see you were only confused.
text_simple: i thought you spoke of mysteries but i see you were only confused

name: temp_rival_14
text: Ever faithful, I slay the master...
text_simple: ever faithful i slay the master

name: temp_rival_15
text: I will trust this was the only path.
text_simple: i will trust this was the only path

name: temp_rival_16
text: I do not understand... But thy will be done.
text_simple: i do not understand but thy will be done

name: temp_rival_17
text: Even this...in service of the temple...
text_simple: even this in service of the temple

name: temp_rival_18
text: Your loud mouth left little to the imagination...
text_simple: your loud mouth left little to the imagination

name: temp_rival_19
text: The world will wonder at your fate. Unlike some, I value discretion.
text_simple: the world will wonder at your fate unlike some i value discretion

name: temp_rival_20
text: You do not even value that for which you fought.
text_simple: you do not even value that for which you fought

name: temp_rival_21
text: You fought for many a noble cause, Donte. Why choose to die for a wicked one?
text_simple: you fought for many a noble cause donte why choose to die for a wicked one

name: temp_rival_22
text: You're even more disagreeable than your father...
text_simple: youre even more disagreeable than your father

name: temp_rival_23
text: I refrained from killing your father. I make no such allowance for you.
text_simple: i refrained from killing your father i make no such allowance for you

name: temp_rival_24
text: You do not even grasp all you truly sacrificed for this...power.
text_simple: you do not even grasp all you truly sacrificed for this power

name: temp_rival_25
text: Yours is not power, it is corruption.
text_simple: yours is not power it is corruption

name: temp_rival_26
text: I bring long-deserved retribution... Tidings from peaceful chroniclers who stand now amongst ashes.
text_simple: i bring longdeserved retribution tidings from peaceful chroniclers who stand now amongst ashes

name: temp_rival_27
text: How many libraries have you left in ruin? How many scholars have you put to the sword?
text_simple: how many libraries have you left in ruin how many scholars have you put to the sword

name: temp_rival_28
text: You knew I didn't want to hurt him, yet you forced my hand.
text_simple: you knew i didnt want to hurt him yet you forced my hand

name: temp_rival_29
text: All right then... Keep your secrets.
text_simple: all right then keep your secrets

name: temp_ally_01
text: Ah, Riki, care to share some trade secrets?

text: If you ever tire of serving Nyx, the Hidden Ones would have you.

text: Warlock, I trust none of my secrets will end up in your grimoire?

text: You are one of the few who understand the value of Silence.

text: Your temple is not mine, Omniknight, but the Hidden Ones instruct me to cooperate.

text: To meet The Most Hidden One... The temple blesses me.

name: temp_ally_08
text: In the face of your wisdom, I am humbled, master.
text_simple: in the face of your wisdom i am humbled master

name: temp_ally_09
text: The ultimate secret revealed, and my service rewarded.
text_simple: the ultimate secret revealed and my service rewarded

text: I'm more interested in... that which remains unsaid, Wu Kong...

text: With apologies, Wu Kong, I do not believe the Temple will find you...

name: temp_ally_13
text: The hedonist's life will reveal few secrets to you, Donte.

name: temp_ally_13_02
text: Thank you, Donte. But I prefer to keep my own counsel on matters of the heart.

name: temp_ally_14
text: You may have foresaken your family, Mireska, but your actions are Sunbreeze to the core.
text_simple: you may have foresaken your family mireska but your actions are sunbreeze to the core

text: I was once tasked with...recovering a certain artifact from your father. He did not part with it willingly.

name: temp_ally_16
text: You did not come by your powers in pursuit of wisdom... That does not mean you are forbidden from using them wisely.
text_simple: you did not come by your powers in pursuit of wisdom that does not mean you are forbidden from using them wisely

text: You are not the first of the Ascended to cross my path. Truthfully, though, you pale in comparison.

pretty_criteria: Grimstroke is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in

text: I should not be surprised, Mars, that your new path still involves bloodshed.

text: I can't hide anything from you.

name: temp_respawn_01
text: A glimpse of the secrets and already they fade.
text_simple: a glimpse of the secrets and already they fade

name: temp_respawn_02
text: I must prove myself in battle to be worthy of the Hidden Ones.
text_simple: i must prove myself in battle to be worthy of the hidden ones

name: temp_respawn_03
text: For death I was unready, so the temple cast me out.
text_simple: for death i was unready so the temple cast me out

name: temp_respawn_04
text: This time I'll be a bit more guarded.
text_simple: this time ill be a bit more guarded

name: temp_respawn_05
text: I would prefer to keep my whereabouts a mystery.
text_simple: i would prefer to keep my whereabouts a mystery

name: temp_respawn_06
text: By my honor that will not happen again.
text_simple: by my honor that will not happen again

name: temp_respawn_07
text: I'll renew my vows if I must, but keep me in your service, Hidden Ones.
text_simple: ill renew my vows if i must but keep me in your service hidden ones

name: temp_respawn_08
text: I have nothing else to offer but my life.
text_simple: i have nothing else to offer but my life

name: temp_respawn_09
text: Please accept my deep regrets. I'll not fail you again.
text_simple: please accept my deep regrets ill not fail you again

name: temp_respawn_10
text: Let's keep that between us, all right?
text_simple: lets keep that between us all right

name: temp_rare_01
text: Where the Hidden Ones send me, I go without question. I do not even question why I question not.
text_simple: where the hidden ones send me i go without question i do not even question why i question not

name: temp_rare_02
text: My body is a temple for which I will kill.
text_simple: my body is a temple for which i will kill

name: temp_rare_03
text: Where mind meets matter, those are the temple steps from which the mysteries may be glimpsed.
text_simple: where mind meets matter those are the temple steps from which the mysteries may be glimpsed

name: temp_rare_04
text: I did not take power nor did I earn it. It came with my vows. And if I were to break them, there would be nothing left.
text_simple: i did not take power nor did i earn it it came with my vows and if i were to break them there would be nothing left

name: temp_void_01
text: I alter the grand equation even without the powers to perceive its whole.
text_simple: i alter the grand equation even without the powers to perceive its whole

name: temp_void_03
text: I trust in the directives I receive -- knowing that I already know all that I must.
text_simple: i trust in the directives i receive knowing that i already know all that i must

text: With the master's face at last known to me, all other answers will come in time.
